thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: Commentator rips on sorority girls taking selfies during baseball game
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Watch: Commentator rips on sorority girls taking selfies during baseball game - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Man-Cave | Watch: Commentator rips on sorority girls taking selfies during baseball game
text:
We get that baseball can be a pretty boring sport, especially to the uninitiated.
It's a sport that's played out over long innings without any real moments of drama and, sure enough, you can drift off during a game because it can readily hold your attention for quite that long. However, this is pretty ridiculous.
The baseball match between the Arizona Diamondbacks and the Colorado Rockies, we'll admit, wasn't much a barnstormer - but the repeated selfies by a group of sorority girls caught the attention of the commentating staff.
Our favourite line has to be when the batter knocks one off and the girls continue taking selfies. We get it, man. It's kinda annoying.
Via YouTube / MLB
